document.full_text: prime minister silvio berlusconi of italy was dealt a resounding blow on monday when mayor letizia moratti of milan failed to avoid a run-off in her bid for re-election.
document.title: europe: italy: berlusconi candidate trails in milan race
lines_and_colors: prime minister silvio berlusconi of italy was dealt a resounding blow on monday when mayor letizia moratti of milan failed to avoid a run-off in her bid for re-election.
